verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H5637>rebellious<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H6213>take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> but not of me; and that <S%H5258>cover<s%> with a <S%H4541>covering,<s%> but not of my <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> that they may <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> to <S%H2403>sin:<s%>

That <S%H1980>walk<s%> to <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and have not <S%H7592>asked<s%> at my <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> to <S%H5810>strengthen<s%> themselves in the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and to <S%H2620>trust<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt!<s%>
Therefore shall the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> be your <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and the <S%H2622>trust<s%> in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> your <S%H3639>confusion.<s%>
For his <S%H8269>princes<s%> were at <S%H6814>Zoan,<s%> and his <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> <S%H5060>came<s%> to <S%H2609>Hanes.<s%>

They were <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of a <S%H5971>people<s%> that could not <S%H3276>profit<s%> them, <S%H3808>nor<s%> be an <S%H5828>help<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3276>profit,<s%> but a <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> a <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H5045>south:<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish,<s%> from <S%H1992>where<s%> come the <S%H3838>young<s%> and <S%H3918>old<s%> <S%H3918>lion,<s%> the <S%H660>viper<s%> and <S%H8314>fiery<s%> <S%H5774>flying<s%> <S%H8314>serpent,<s%> they will <S%H5375>carry<s%> their <S%H2428>riches<s%> on the <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> of young <S%H5895>asses,<s%> and their <S%H214>treasures<s%> on the <S%H1707>bunches<s%> of <S%H1581>camels,<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> that shall not <S%H3276>profit<s%> them.

For the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> shall <S%H5826>help<s%> in <S%H1892>vain,<s%> and to <S%H7385>no<s%> <S%H7385>purpose:<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> have I <S%H7121>cried<s%> concerning <S%H2063>this,<s%> Their <S%H7293>strength<s%> is to <S%H7674>sit<s%> <S%H7673>still.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> <S%H935>go,<s%> <S%H3789>write<s%> it <S%H854>before<s%> them in a <S%H3871>table,<s%> and <S%H2710>note<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> that it may be for the <S%H3117>time<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%> and <S%H5769>ever:<s%>

That <S%H1931>this<s%> is a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3586>lying<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> that <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7200>seers,<s%> <S%H7200>See<s%> not; and to the <S%H2374>prophets,<s%> <S%H2372>Prophesy<s%> not to us <S%H5229>right<s%> things, <S%H1696>speak<s%> to us <S%H2513>smooth<s%> things, <S%H2372>prophesy<s%> <S%H4123>deceits:<s%>

Get you out of the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> out of the <S%H734>path,<s%> cause the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> us.

<S%H3651>Why<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you <S%H3988>despise<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word,<s%> and <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H6233>oppression<s%> and <S%H3868>perverseness,<s%> and <S%H8172>stay<s%> <S%H5921>thereon:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall be to you as a <S%H6556>breach<s%> ready to <S%H5307>fall,<s%> <S%H1158>swelling<s%> out in a <S%H7682>high<s%> <S%H2346>wall,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7667>breaking<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> at an <S%H6621>instant.<s%>

And he shall <S%H7665>break<s%> it as the <S%H7667>breaking<s%> of the <S%H3335>potters'<s%> <S%H5035>vessel<s%> that is <S%H3807>broken<s%> in pieces; he shall not <S%H2550>spare:<s%> so that there shall not be <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H4386>bursting<s%> of it a <S%H2789>shard<s%> to <S%H2846>take<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3344>hearth,<s%> or to <S%H2834>take<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> with out of the <S%H1360>pit.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> In <S%H7729>returning<s%> and <S%H5183>rest<s%> shall you be <S%H3467>saved;<s%> in <S%H8252>quietness<s%> and in <S%H985>confidence<s%> shall be your <S%H1369>strength:<s%> and you <S%H14>would<s%> not.

But you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> for we will <S%H5127>flee<s%> on <S%H5483>horses;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall you <S%H5127>flee:<s%> and, We will <S%H7392>ride<s%> on the <S%H7031>swift;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall they that <S%H7291>pursue<s%> you be <S%H7043>swift.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall flee <S%H6440>at<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of <S%H259>one;<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> the <S%H1606>rebuke<s%> of <S%H2568>five<s%> shall you <S%H5127>flee:<s%> till you be <S%H3498>left<s%> as a <S%H8650>beacon<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and as an <S%H5251>ensign<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> an <S%H1389>hill.<s%>

And <S%H3651>therefore<s%> will the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2442>wait,<s%> that he may be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you, and <S%H3651>therefore<s%> will he be <S%H7311>exalted,<s%> that he may have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on you: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is a <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment:<s%> <S%H835>blessed<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H2442>wait<s%> for him.

For the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> you shall <S%H1058>weep<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1058>more:<s%> he will be very <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to you at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of your <S%H2201>cry;<s%> when he shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> it, he will <S%H6030>answer<s%> you.

And though the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H6862>adversity,<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3905>affliction,<s%> yet shall not your <S%H3384>teachers<s%> be <S%H3670>removed<s%> into a <S%H3671>corner<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> but your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H3384>teachers:<s%>

And your <S%H241>ears<s%> shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H3212>walk<s%> you in it, <S%H3588>when<s%> you turn to the <S%H541>right<s%> hand, and <S%H3588>when<s%> you turn to the <S%H8041>left.<s%>

You shall <S%H2930>defile<s%> also the <S%H6826>covering<s%> of your <S%H6456>graven<s%> images of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H642>ornament<s%> of your <S%H4541>molten<s%> images of <S%H2091>gold:<s%> you shall <S%H2219>cast<s%> them <S%H2219>away<s%> as a <S%H1739>menstruous<s%> <S%H4346>cloth;<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to it, <S%H3318>Get<s%> you <S%H3318>hence.<s%>

Then shall he <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> that you shall <S%H2232>sow<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> with; and <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H8393>increase<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> and it shall be <S%H1879>fat<s%> and <S%H8082>plenteous:<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall your <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H7337>large<s%> <S%H3733>pastures.<s%>

The <S%H504>oxen<s%> likewise and the young <S%H5895>asses<s%> that <S%H5647>ear<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H2548>clean<s%> <S%H1098>provender,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has been <S%H2219>winnowed<s%> with the <S%H7371>shovel<s%> and with the <S%H4214>fan.<s%>

And there shall be on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> and on <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4791>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill,<s%> <S%H6388>rivers<s%> and <S%H2988>streams<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H2027>slaughter,<s%> when the <S%H4026>towers<s%> <S%H5307>fall.<s%>

Moreover the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H3842>moon<s%> shall be as the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2535>sun,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be <S%H7659>sevenfold,<s%> as the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2280>binds<s%> up the <S%H7667>breach<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7495>heals<s%> the <S%H4273>stroke<s%> of their <S%H4347>wound.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> from <S%H4801>far,<s%> <S%H1197>burning<s%> with his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and the <S%H4858>burden<s%> thereof is <S%H3514>heavy:<s%> his <S%H8193>lips<s%> are <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H2195>indignation,<s%> and his <S%H3956>tongue<s%> as a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire:<s%>

And his <S%H7307>breath,<s%> as an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream,<s%> shall <S%H2673>reach<s%> to the <S%H2673>middle<s%> of the <S%H6677>neck,<s%> to <S%H5130>sift<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> with the <S%H5299>sieve<s%> of <S%H7723>vanity:<s%> and there shall be a <S%H7448>bridle<s%> in the <S%H3895>jaws<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> causing them to <S%H8582>err.<s%>

You shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H7892>song,<s%> as in the <S%H3915>night<s%> when a <S%H6942>holy<s%> <S%H2282>solemnity<s%> is <S%H6942>kept;<s%> and <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart,<s%> as when one <S%H1980>goes<s%> with a <S%H2485>pipe<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H6697>mighty<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall cause his <S%H1935>glorious<s%> <S%H6963>voice<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and shall <S%H7200>show<s%> the <S%H5183>lighting<s%> <S%H5183>down<s%> of his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> with the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of his <S%H639>anger,<s%> and with the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of a <S%H398>devouring<s%> <S%H784>fire,<s%> with <S%H5311>scattering,<s%> and <S%H2230>tempest,<s%> and <S%H68>hailstones<s%> <S%H1259><s%>.
For through the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> be <S%H2865>beaten<s%> down, which <S%H5221>smote<s%> with a <S%H7626>rod.<s%>

And in <S%H3605>every<s%> place where the <S%H4145>grounded<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> shall <S%H4569>pass,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5117>lay<s%> on him, it shall be with <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> and <S%H3658>harps:<s%> and in <S%H4421>battles<s%> of <S%H8573>shaking<s%> will he <S%H3898>fight<s%> with it.

For <S%H8613>Tophet<s%> is <S%H6186>ordained<s%> of <S%H865>old;<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> for the <S%H4428>king<s%> it is <S%H3559>prepared;<s%> he has made it <S%H6009>deep<s%> and <S%H7337>large:<s%> the <S%H4071>pile<s%> thereof is <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H6086>wood;<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> like a <S%H5158>stream<s%> of <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> does <S%H1197>kindle<s%> it.
